divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing in my drive talking on the phone when I looked up into the west sky and noticed a bright light with a strange mushroom shaped aura above it. Thinking it a bit srtange I emiditly put on my glasses so that I might get a better look at it. I then noticed that the light was what appered to be a ball of flame with a mushroom shaped bubble above it with what seamed to be polka dots in it. the aura above the object seamed to be semi transparent. I watched the object move at a fast pace to the south east at what seamed to be aproxmatly 40 degrees until it dissapared from view in less than a minite.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Saint Clair Shores
